name: Pencil Case TD
description:
Pencil Case TD is a tower defense game with a pencil case and stationery as the theme. In the beginning, there are only pencils. You can go to the hall to earn money, learning points, talent points, certificates, etc. Use the money to buy and upgrade different stationery, Learning points strengthen your ability, talent points and certificates can enhance your talent ability, and you can complete all courses by continuously improving yourself.

Game Features

Pen holder

Each defense tower also needs a pen holder to place, and each pen holder can also give the tower a different ability bonus or weakening. How to make the defense tower maximize its power depends on how the player combines the pen holder and different stationery.

Stationery

Just like different tower defense games have turret archers, etc., but now they are all stationery, and different stationery has different functions.

Learning points

At the end of each class, players will get learning points, and how to distribute them will become the key to customs clearance.

Talent

Talent can be improved through talent points and certificates, and improving different talents can also enhance your strength. It is more useful than learning points, but for the time being, it can only be obtained by passing quizzes or exams (of course, you have to get good grades on the test to get ^o^).

pen case

Of course, players also need to buy a new pencil case to store the stationery.
